synopsis.text: As a new school year dawns, childhood friends Konomi Yuzuhara and Takāki Kono enter high school together, eager to start this next chapter. On their first day, they reunite with their friend from childhood, Tamaki Kosaka. Over the coming days and weeks, Konomi, Takāki, and Tamaki meet an array of new classmates, some of whom make quite an impression. Though focused on their studies, this tight-knit group of friends finds themselves drawn into various adventures and hijinks with their eccentric new acquaintances. Through it all, the bonds between the childhood trio remain strong. Yet they are also open to forging new connections. One thing is clear - this will be a year full of laughter, drama, self-discovery, and lasting memories with old friends and new.
